about_the_game:
The Realm

Enter the Quest Master's Realm, a Realtime Action based World of Fantasy MMORPG.
Adventure aboard the Shell of a Gigantic Turtle, 'Great Crom', as he swims throughout the Etherverse.

Open World

Single Server - No Instances.

Same Character - Different Roles

Play one Character, in a variety of Roles.
Switch between Skill Sets defining your Abilities and Equipment.

Follow Quel or Hel

As Followers of Quel, the God of Light, or Hel, Goddess of the Underworld, you have the Gift of Resurrection.

"On the back of Crom we sail" - Youtube Gameplay :

Fight

Battle Opposing Forces.
Fast Paced Melee and Ranged Action Combat.
Multiplayer.
PvP and PvE.

Craft

Craft and Discover New Items of increasing Rarity.

Level

Level up your Skills and Equipment as you prepare to meet the most Mythic of Enemies.

Quest

Deep Questing Elements lead to new Achievements and Opportunities.

Online Server Access

Buying this game package entitles you to access our online Multiplayer Game Servers, Normally available 24 / 7 in both Europe and America. Can play from outside these zones, just expect different latencies.

Our Discord


Our Discord server is quite active. People there will be able to respond to any cries for help, information, or just to chat about the game and anything else.

If you are unhappy in any way please try to contact us here before leaving bad reviews. We can likely fix any issues you are experiencing.

The game is still in an early state of development and we value any feedback or suggestions you might offer.

Requests for new features are warmly received and can, quite possibly, be added to the game relatively quickly.

Click below or on discord icon in game login panel to join.

name: Quest Master's Realm

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RX550 , GT1030
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional Notes: minimal build for 30fps
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10 / 11
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nvidia gtx1060, rtx or radeon equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional Notes: build for 60fps+

short_description: Realtime Action Combat MMORPG. Battle Foes and Complete Quests to Level up your Skills and Equipment. Prepare to face the most Mythic of Enemies. Swap between different Skill Sets whilst playing the Same Character. Craft and Discover New Items of Increasing Rarity. Open World - No Instances.
